attributes.action: Implement a Law to prevent Cardigans Like the one Kevin Hall being worn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Starskey and Hutch cardigans went out in the 1970s and should never be worn in public.

Kevin Hall should be made an example of and publicly flogged in front of parliment whilst naked in the freezing cold.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
